tool_description: Assesses synthesized speech quality including naturalness, intelligibility, artifacts, and overall audio fidelity.

audio_file_path.description: Path to audio file for quality assessment

assessment_metrics.description: Metrics to evaluate: naturalness, intelligibility, artifacts, prosody

error_messages: Invalid audio file: Ensure file exists and is in supported format (WAV, MP3, FLAC).
Audio too short: Provide at least 1 second of audio for meaningful assessment.
Invalid assessment metrics: Use naturalness, intelligibility, artifacts, or prosody.
Poor audio quality: Input audio has significant technical issues affecting assessment.
usage: Provide audio file path and optionally reference text and specific metrics to assess synthesized speech quality comprehensively.
